name: Ocean Soul
description:
Ocean Soul is a 2D Platform game where players will need to guide the lost soul through screens in order to escape from a long sunk, and cursed, vessel.

Initially created for:

Godot Wild Jam #41

Known Issues:

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move

Created by Calin Clement O'Ceallaigh (Ziszle) and Arron Chave (Gonzo0193)
